content:
<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="javax-to-jakarta-bootstrapping-files-00001">
            <when>
                <file filename="javax.enterprise{*}"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Bootstrapping files prefixed with javax should be renamed to use the jakarta prefix">
                        <message>Replace the bootstrapping file name prefix `javax.` with `jakarta.`</message>
                        <link href="https://jakarta.ee/" title="Jakarta EE"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
